Grouping and sumarizing
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

gapminder %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp))

gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1957) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp))

gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1957) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp), maxGdpPercap = max(gdpPercap))

```

Agrupamiento usando Group_by
```{r}
gapminder %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp), maxGdpPercap = max(gdpPercap))
  
gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1957) %>%
  group_by(continent) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp), maxGdpPercap = max(gdpPercap))

```

Agrupamiento por mas de una columna
```{r}

gapminder %>%
  group_by(continent, year) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp), maxGdpPercap = max(gdpPercap))

```

Visualizaciones
```{r}
by_year <- gapminder %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp), maxGdpPercap = max(gdpPercap))

by_year

ggplot(by_year, aes(x=year, y=medianLifeExp)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
by_year_continent <- gapminder %>%
  group_by(continent, year) %>%
  summarize(medianGdpPercap = median(gdpPercap))

by_year_continent

ggplot(by_year_continent, aes(x=year, y=medianGdpPercap, color = continent)) +
  geom_point()

```

Tipos de visualizaci√≥n
Grafica de lineas
```{r}
by_year <- gapminder %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(medianGdpPercap = median(gdpPercap))

ggplot(by_year, aes(x=year, y=medianGdpPercap)) +
  geom_line()

```
```{r}
by_year <- gapminder %>%
  group_by(year, continent) %>%
  summarize(medianGdpPercap = median(gdpPercap))

ggplot(by_year, aes(x=year, y=medianGdpPercap, color = continent)) +
  geom_line()
```

Grafico de barras
```{r}
oceania_1952 <- gapminder %>%
  filter(continent == "Oceania", year == 1952)

oceania_1952

ggplot(oceania_1952, aes(x=country, y=gdpPercap, fill = country)) +
  geom_col()
```

Histogramas
```{r}
gapminder_1952 <- gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1952) %>%
  mutate(pop_by_mil = pop / 1000000)


gapminder_1952

ggplot(gapminder_1952, aes(x=pop_by_mil)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=50)
```

```{r}
gapminder_1952 <- gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1952)

gapminder_1952

ggplot(gapminder_1952, aes(x=pop)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=50) +
  scale_x_log10()

```

Boxplot
```{r}
gapminder_1952 <- gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1952)

gapminder_1952

ggplot(gapminder_1952, aes(x=continent, y=gdpPercap)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_log10()

```
